search_parameters.q: Metallica, age, music related skills + abilities + occupations, proficiency in each, and current residence location (city, state)

text_blocks.snippet: The current members of Metallica are all in their early 60s. While they were founded in Los Angeles, the band has been famously based in the San Francisco Bay Area for most of their career, though individual members now reside in different states.

list.snippet: James Hetfield
Age: 62 (Born August 3, 1963).
Occupations: Lead vocalist, rhythm guitarist, songwriter, co-founder.
Skills & Abilities: Renowned for high-speed down-picking, "raspy" yet "clean" vocal range, and rhythmic precision.
Proficiency: Master-level rhythm guitarist; widely considered one of the greatest in metal history.
Current Residence: Vail, Colorado (moved from California for a "quieter" life and outdoor hobbies).
Lars Ulrich
Age: 62 (Born December 26, 1963).
Occupations: Drummer, songwriter, co-founder, business strategist.
Skills & Abilities: Pioneer of double-bass drumming in thrash metal; expert in song arrangement and band management.
Proficiency: Expert level; though occasionally debated by critics, his influence on the genre's structure and business is foundational.
Current Residence: San Francisco Bay Area, California (longtime resident of Tiburon).
Kirk Hammett
Age: 63 (Born November 18, 1962).
Occupations: Lead guitarist, songwriter.
Skills & Abilities: Virtuosic soloing, extensive use of the wah-wah pedal, and background in classical music theory.
Proficiency: Elite-level lead guitarist; ranked among the top guitarists by major music publications.
Current Residence: Sonoma, California and Hawaii.
Robert Trujillo
Age: 61 (Born October 23, 1964).
Occupations: Bassist, backing vocalist.
Skills & Abilities: Finger-style playing (rare in metal), slap bass, and deep funk/jazz-influenced grooves.
Proficiency: Virtuoso-level; known for high technical ability and keeping up with the band's fastest tempos without a pick.
Current Residence: Venice, California (though he maintains property in the Bay Area).

text_blocks.snippet: Are you planning to catch them on their current world tour, or are you just diving into the band's history?
